title: help! a nautical style font!
content:
Any ideas guys? I'm stuck and need a quick fix!

Cheers!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030703/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_42.jpg) | 55.42 KB |
author: jamiegrind

comments.content:
That looks like Bo Berndal's [Boberia](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030703/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/boberia/). I use it on some of the Spice Labels I make. That A is a good earmark.

- Mike Yanega
